title: macbook 15 820-2850 ram problem
message:
Macbook 15 has a strange issue, it works for a while, but after a few days ram are not detected and starts to beep. Removing and installing again ram fixes the issue. this issue is happened three times in a week. 
Is ram slot going to die? How can I fix this issue?

title: macbook 15 820-2850 ram problem
message: Probably a RAM slot. Could be crap corrosion in there. Have you tried installing RAM in a single slot yet ?

title: macbook 15 820-2850 ram problem
message: The slot closest to the keyboard is the one that is usually the problem. Max out the other slot with 8GB.
